casebody.data:
JAMES E. WARD et al., Plaintiffs and Appellants, v. JOHN TURL et al., Defendants and Respondents.

Before Monell, Curtis, and Sedgwick, JJ.

Decided June 29, 1872. Appeal from a judgment dismissing complaint. . *561Joseph S. Ridgway, for appellants. David McAdam, for respondents.

Judgment reversed, and new trial ordered, with costs.

Opinion by Curtis, J., Monell and Sedgwick, JJ., concurring.
